{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.139
    | text      = anyone who just kind of want to feel like believing in more interesting versions of

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:02.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:04.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:19.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.139
    | text      = was planning to make a bomb and commit a bombing, but the specific details of it and the target
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:30.139
    | text      = were not known.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:32.139
    | text      = Agents were apparently not in agreement about the best way to proceed, with one plan being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.139
    | text      = to supply fake explosive powder for the bomb so that they could arrest everyone when they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:40.139
    | text      = attempted to carry out the bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.139

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:44.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:46.139

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.139
    | text      = Instead, they wanted Salam to wear a wire and gather more information about the plot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.139

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.140

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:13.140

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.140

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:39.140
    | text      = demonstrates that this was a government plot or a false flag.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:43.140

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
